title: Can't create a pbe account or apply for testing...

body: After consecutive times of refreshing the page, relogging into the league of legends website, and reopening my browser, I still cannot seem to apply for testing or create a pbe account. Whenever I load the page up it says that a problem has occurred and it says that my application was received but I couldn't create an account. I hope this problem is resolved so I can hopefully apply for testing and be able to test the new changes on the Public Beta Environment!

replies.body:
I went ahead and pulled up your account and it does look like you were able to apply for PBE, but you haven't been accepted quite yet. Now that you've applied, be on the lookout for an acceptance email. 

We typically invite people whose playstyle reflects what we're testing, for instance, when we were testing the Galio rework we might have invited a large number of Galio mains to see how he worked. You can check out all the details on our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).
Ok! Thank you for your help and quick response :)
